feat.name: Phiarlan Performer
feat.trigger: You fail a non-secret Performance check.
entries: Your training with house Phiarlan grants you a stage presence that masks your mistakes. If you roll a failure on a Performance check, you can reroll the check. You may select the better of the two rolls.

feat.name: Thuranni Specter
feat.trigger: You fail a non-secret Stealth check.
entries: Your training with house Thuranni grants you an understanding of using the light and shadow around you to your advantage. If you roll a failure on a Stealth check, you can reroll the check. You may select the better of the two rolls.
